articles.title: Spokesman for N. Side's Delegation to N-S High-level Contact Blasts S. Korea's Scattering of Anti-DPRK Leaflets
articles.content:
Spokesman for N. Side's Delegation to N-S High-level Contact Blasts S. Korea's Scattering of Anti-DPRK Leaflets
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The north-south relations have been driven into a catastrophic phase again due to the south Korean authorities' frantic scattering of anti-DPRK leaflets. The spokesman for the north side's delegation to the north-south high-level contact issued a statement revealing its gravity on Friday.
					 It says: 
					
					 The south Korean authorities headed by Park Geun Hye dared take issue with the nuclear issue of their fellow countrymen outside Korea. Inside south Korea they are busy openly encouraging the operation to scatter leaflets against fellow countrymen and smear campaign against them.
					
					 The ceaseless leaflet scattering operation in south Korea is an open breach of the valuable agreement reached between the north and the south and the most serious act of treachery that can never be pardoned.
					
					 The north and the south reached a historic agreement at the high-level contact on February 14 in which they solemnly stated to the nation that they would refrain from slandering each other.
					
					 But the situation is quite contrary to our expectation.
					
					 It is because the pledge which south Korea made upon authorization of Park Geun Hye turned out to be a smokescreen to cover up the leaflet scattering operation that was carried out at the connivance of the authorities and the smear campaign against the north that has gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 We cannot but query is it Park's style negotiating tactics to produce a honeyed agreement in a bid to attain her goal and is it her special skill for "confidence-building" as she is unhesitatingly reneging on the agreement under such absurd pretexts as "nature of social system" and "freedom of speech".
					
					 The leaflet scattering operation and smear campaign against the DPRK going beyond the tolerance limit are undisguised acts of declaring a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Park named the leaflet scattering against the DPRK a "balloon operation" and is making sure that a military posture is taken to cope with the possible counterattack of the DPRK.
					
					 In the long run, this tells that she is aware that a leaflet scattering operation conducted under the signboard of "balloon operation" is a dangerous source of a military retaliation.
					
					 We have long regarded the leaflet scattering by the south side as a declaration of a war and papers for sentencing death to human scum who orchestrated the leaflet scattering operations.
					
					 Does she really want to see such leaflets becoming a source of war for reducing the base of provocations to ashes?
					
					 She should bear in mind that now is the time to make a choice herself.
					
					 The more desperately Park is hurling betesnoires and conservative media into the smear campaign against fellow countrymen, the deeper she will find herself in an inescapable quagmire.
					
					 Those who go frantic with the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering and smear campaign against compatriots going against the trend of the times can never be called human beings with normal way of thinking and fair media persons.
					
					 All of them are without exception betesnoires disqualified to be members of the nation and top class criminals who will not be able to live in the peaceful and stable reunified country.
					
					 The more zealously Pak harbors betesnoires, the worse smell she will feel. In the long run, she will earn the ill fame of being an owner of huge dumping ground.
					
					 Ethics and morality are more important than politics.
					
					 A politician should be more human than any others and pursue justice and truth.
					
					 Otherwise she will consider the presidential chair as a commanding tower for smear campaign and make no scruple of throwing the nation into an abyss of misfortune by misusing it. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are to have an elementary face to appear before the DPRK side, they should properly implement the north-south agreement, to begin with.
					
					 All compatriots are closely watching the moves of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Warned of Their Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Warned of Their Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Aiding  Overseas Compatriots of Korea made public a statement on Friday denouncing the Japanese authorities for their extremely dangerous moves to stifle the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan.
					 On March 24 the Japanese authorities took such fascist action as instigating the Tokyo District Court to make an illegal decision to allow the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 This is a wanton violation of the dignity and existence right of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are feigning ignorance of the fact, noting that the decision was made by a "judiciary organ" in a bid to evade the blame for seizing the Korean hall. But this is no more than an excuse to cover up their sinister criminal purpose.
					
					 It is their sinister political scenario to deprive the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon of the base of its activities and thus weaken the authority of Chongryon, a model of Juche-based overseas Koreans' movement, and dampen the elated patriotic enthusiasm of Koreans so as to stamp out the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Now that the Japanese authorities deliberately touched off distrust at a time when confidence-building is required for improving the DPRK-Japan relations more urgently than ever before the DPRK is compelled to take corresponding measures.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities persist in their moves to seize the Korean Hall despite the warning of the DPRK, they will be wholly responsible for the consequences to be entailed by them.

articles.title: Illegality of Tokyo District Court's Decision Disclosed
articles.content:
Illegal Decision of Tokyo District Court Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Tokyo District Court made a decision to allow the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) under the backstage wire-pulling of the Japanese authorities. The spokesman for the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea Saturday released a statement disclosing the illegality of the decision.
					 The statement says:
					
					 The illegality of the decision finds its vivid manifestation in that the court selected a disqualified company as a successful bidder by fraud and swindle.
					
					 The Tokyo District Court had delayed the announcement of the results of auction of the Korean Hall of Chongryon, which was made in October of 2013. On March 20, it reopened the tenders for it for no reason all of a sudden and made the decision to allow the sale to the Marunaka Holdings Co. Ltd., Japan.
					
					 As far as the above-said company is concerned, it had already been disqualified as it underbid others in October last year and took back bid bond from the court.
					
					 In particular, it is a precedent of the Japanese courts that in case the relevant court returned the bid bond to a disqualified company it would not make a decision to allow the sale to it.
					
					 Therefore, it was a crude violation of the law in every aspect that the court chose the above-said company as a successful bidder.
					
					 The illegality of the decision of the Tokyo District Court is also evidenced by the double-dealing attitude of the Resolution and Collection Corporation, a creditor.
					
					 When the issue of the Korean Hall presented itself, the Corporation made a hostile and discriminating demand that Chongryon should repay a total amount plus interest though it has settled issues with other debtors in a friendly manner.
					
					 But the Corporation kept mum about the decision of the Tokyo District Court to sell the Korean Hall at a price less than half the actual one.
					
					 The Japanese authorities has long regarded the Korean Hall of Chongryon on which the flag of the DPRK is fluttering as a thorn in their flesh and run the whole gamut of plots to seize it.
					
					 That was why the Tokyo District Court staged an unprecedented farce in disregard of the Japanese law, precedents of the courts and practices of the basic procedures for tenders
					
					 The Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea categorically rejects the decision of the Tokyo District Court and declares internally and externally that the illegal decision is invalid, the statement says.
					
					 The Japanese authorities had better halt their moves to seize the Korean Hall, though belatedly, if it thinks of its face as a "law-governed state" even a bit and has real intention to improve the relations with the DPRK, the statement concludes.

articles.title: Sailors Interviewed after Their Return Home
articles.content:
Sailors Interviewed after Their Return Home
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The sailors who had come back to the DPRK from south Korea to where they had been taken were interviewed by domestic and foreign reporters at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday.
					 Fishing boat captain Rim Chun Su, chief engineer Kim Chol and crewman Kim Thae Won belonging to the Ongjin Fishery Station spoke at the press conference. 
					
					 They spoke of how the fishing boat was seized by the south Korean military gangsters and the atrocities committed by them against its crew. 
					
					 They said: We left Kumi-ri, Ryongyon County at around 2 o'clock on Thursday afternoon to pick up clams.
					
					 As we were sailing while picking up clams, thick sea fog began to hang over as dusk fell.
					
					 Finding it hard to do the work any longer, we veered the boat towards the port.
					
					 A short while later, a propelling shaft stopped operation due to a gearbox trouble.
					
					 We had no other way but to stop the boat and repair the boat.
					
					 When we were judging the direction with a compass after getting it repaired, a clipper of the south Korean puppet navy appeared, blocking its sailing at full speed. It forced our boat to sail southward.
					
					 The enemies fired bullets at the fishing boat to threaten us.
					
					 We could not allow us to be meekly taken away by the puppet navy hooligans.
					
					 In order to let our patrol boat spot our position, we made a ball of fire, lighted it and shook it towards the north.
					
					 A short while later two small clippers appeared and began to encircle our boat.
					
					 The clipper that had appeared earlier turned a search light on the boat, blocking its sailing. And the two other clippers sailed close to our boat on its both sides, forcing it to sail southward.
					
					 As it grew completely dark, our engine stopped again, making it impossible to move any more.
					
					 The clippers completely encircled our boat, brandishing iron sticks and throwing iron hooks at it.
					
					 We fell unconscious, hit hard by iron sticks of the enemies.
					
					 It was when the boat arrived in a place believed to be a pier of Paekryong Island that we came back to our senses. We were shackled and blindfolded.
					
					 The hooligans of the puppet army took us to a certain building by a truck and asked us ages, names and others. They also asked us one by one if we had any idea of surrendering. 
					
					 We did not answer but just said we were fishermen and would go to the embrace of the respected Marshal at once.
					
					  The enemies tried hard to make us change our minds, saying that "Come over to the south. If you surrender, we will make you live well. We will provide you with living conditions and jobs."
					
					 The sailors fought back the enemies, defying their appeasement and pressure in order to come back to the fold of the motherland.
					
					 So, they could come back to the embrace of the motherland at around 02:00 on Friday.
					
					 Rim Chun Su said that it was only after he came back home that he learned the group of puppet hooligans could not but send them back in a great haste in the face of the strong measures taken by the motherland. He added: 
					
					 It was just several hours that we fought hard against the barbaric acts and pressure of the enemies to put us to submission.
					
					 While fighting back the enemies, we realized what type the enemies were and made up our minds to settle accounts with them to the last.
					
					 We also keenly realized through our experience the immutable truth that there is nothing to be afraid of and that we are sure to win even though we are left alone in the vast sea or are put in custody by the enemies as long as there is the respected Marshal.
					
					 We firmly pledge to make redoubled efforts to carry out our revolutionary tasks with surging indignation at the enemies who are running amuck to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system and thus further glorify our country.
					
					 Then the sailors answered questions raised by reporters.
					
					 At the press conference the participants watched a video dealing with the atrocities committed by the hooligans of the south Korean puppet army against the peaceable boat and personnel of the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation headed by V.V. Grishkov, first secretary of the committee, visited statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them after laying a bouquet before their statues on Saturday.

articles.title: Peasant's Family Famed for Mushroom Cultivation in DPRK
articles.content:
Peasant's Family Famed for Mushroom Cultivation in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- In the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City in the DPRK, there is the family of Jong Sun Chol famed for mushroom cultivation.
					 Jong is a member of the farm's youth workteam, and his family has cultivated appetizing and nutritious mushroom on a massive scale at a greenhouse with an area of tens of square meters, built in the yard of the house.
					
					 This family has reaped 800 kilograms of mushroom from last September to March this year, and its harvest is expected to amount to more than one tonne till April.
					
					 It was 18 years ago that Jong's family began to grow mushroom in response to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy for cultivating mushroom widely at all units and households.
					
					 Busy as they were with farm work, Jong and his wife strove to get the knack of mushroom cultivation at spare time with help of scientists of a research institution and technicians of the farm. After experiencing setback many times, they got accustomed to cultivation technique and method at last.
					
					 At present Jong's family turns out a large quantity of mushroom every year by making mushroom substrate and spores with corncob by itself.     Such mushroom cultivation has brought big profits to the family, improving its livelihood.
					
					 Many people from across the country are now visiting this family to learn its good experience.

articles.title: DPRK, Tax-free Country
articles.content:
DPRK, Tax-free Country 
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The tax system was totally abolished in the DPRK on April 1, Juche 63 (1974).
					 On this day the centuries-old desire of the Korean people to live in the tax-free world was realized. It was a historic event in which the country without tax system emerged in the world.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung built the socialist system centred on the popular masses, the first tax-free country in the world. He unfolded the plan for abolishing the unpopular tax system during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and set an example in the guerrilla bases, liberated areas.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea, he abolished the predatory and colonial tax system of Japanese imperialism and established the most popular and democratic tax system. He enforced the policy of systematically relieving the people of tax burden on the basis of the foundation of the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 He put forward the important task on totally abolishing the tax system in the near future at the Fourth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. Pushing ahead with the work to carry out the task, he made sure that agricultural tax in kind was abolished, to begin with.
					
					 The agricultural tax in kind was totally abolished between 1964 and 1966 according to "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country" published by him.
					
					  At the 8th Plenary Meeting of the Fifth Central Committee of the WPK held in February 1974 he made sure that the decision on totally abolishing the tax system in the DPRK was adopted. At the Third Session of the Fifth Supreme People's Assembly in March he promulgated the law on totally abolishing the tax system.
					
					 The total abolition of the tax system was a brilliant result of his loving care for the people and an immortal feat he performed in building Korean-style socialism which applied the Juche idea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating Second Huichon Spirit
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating Second Huichon Spirit
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- All builders of the cascade power stations along the River Chongchon, let's dash ahead like the wind in the van of the builders of a thriving nation, creating the second Huichon Spirit, a spirit of the new era, under the leadership of the great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu!
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an editorial.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an urgent requirement of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea in the new century of Juche and the intention of history to create the second Huichon Spirit, a spirit of the new era,
					
					 The on-going struggle to create the spirit is a sacred one to powerfully demonstrate the revolutionary traits of the Korean people intensely loyal to the idea and guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Absolute trust and boundless loyalty to the leader represents an engine for creating the spirit.
					
					 The on-going struggle to create the spirit is also a heroic death-defying one to fully demonstrate the spirit of "At a Go" of Songun Korea, the spirit of making a great leap forward and innovations.
					
					 The builders of the cascade power stations along the River Chongchon are the fighters devotedly implementing the party's policies as they have fully displayed the revolutionary soldier spirit since the days of creating the Huichon Spirit.
					
					 The on-going struggle to create the above-said spirit is an honorable one to powerfully demonstrate the might of Korean-style socialism, the might of collectivism.
					
					 The construction sites of the power stations are the places where flavor of socialism is strongly felt and its true nature lives on.
					
					 The editorial calls on all builders of the power stations and other people across the country to dash ahead like the wind in the second Huichon Spirit and thus give fuller play to the spirit of prosperity of Songun Korea, the spirit of leap forward.

articles.title: U.S. Sinister Intention Veiled with "Human Rights" Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Sinister Intention Veiled with "Human Rights" Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The United States had better roll back at once its hostile policy toward the DPRK, bearing in mind that its conspiratorial anti-DPRK "human rights" racket can never work on anyone, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and riff raffs' trumpeting about "human rights" sounds like no more than a shriek of those taken aback by the might of the DPRK wining victory after victory.
					
					 The U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" row is a groundless mud- slinging and a crude encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK fully guarantees the people's political freedom and rights, guided by the idea of believing in people as in Heaven and, therefore, earned worldwide fame as the most dignified and independent country.
					
					 Those backbiters who are talking about "democracy" and the like in the country are the shameless human rights abusers. 
					
					  The U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" racket amounts to serious political terrorism intended to bring down the DPRK's ideology and social system.
					
					 The U.S. is using the "human rights" issue as one of the main levers for isolating and stifling the DPRK.
					
					 It is ridiculous enough for the U.S. to term the DPRK "country of evils" and "evil place", creating impression that there is "human rights" issue there and it should be forced to yield to its demands.
					
					 The DPRK has never asked the U.S. to do something as regards the human rights issue and suggested it to play the role of a "judge of human rights".
					
					 The U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" racket characterized by injustice will only prove the validity of the DPRK's cause and the advantages of the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: Fate of North-South Relations Entirely Depends on Attitude of S. Korean Authorities: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Fate of North-South Relations Entirely Depends on Attitude of S. Korean Authorities: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The present south Korean chief executive made very provocative remarks for no reason over the DPRK's nuclear issue at the 3rd "nuclear security summit" held in Netherlands. The DPRK laid bare the injustice of her remarks and drew attention to her undesirable demeanor in an answer given by the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) to the question raised by KCNA.
					 However, the south Korean authorities are making much fuss about the "serious violation" of the agreement on halting the smear campaign between the north and south.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard: The south Korean chief executive let loose a string of very reckless remarks against the DPRK, groundlessly accusing it over its nuclear issue at the summit, though she is not well informed of the essence of the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK told truth as it could not remain a passive onlooker to the behavior of the south Korean chief executive agitating confrontation in violation of the above-said agreement.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 If the south Korean regime persists in its malignant smear campaign defying the DPRK's warnings, the north-south relations are bound to collapse.
					
					 The north-south relations are put at serious peril due to the provocative Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers now under way in south Korea. 
					
					 She should have expressed concern about this situation and cogitated about how to put it under control.
					
					 If she calls on foreign forces to boost cooperation in the confrontation with the DPRK, urging it to dismantle its nukes, the north-south relations are bound to meet tragic consequences.
					
					 The fate of the inter-Korean relations entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: U.S. Sinister Intention of Spreading Story of "Threat from North Korea" Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Sinister Intention of Spreading Story of "Threat from North Korea" Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. warmongers are spreading the story that a war on the Korean peninsula is imminent. 
					 The story about "threat" form the DPRK spread by the U.S. warmongers is aimed to cover up their aggressive scenario and stifle the DPRK at any cost, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. ulterior purpose is to ignite a new war for aggression against the DPRK under the pretext of the "threat".
					
					 The U.S. regards the Korean peninsula as the gate to Asia in carrying out its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to ignite a war on the peninsula and use this area as its military strategic base for establishing military domination on Asia.
					
					 It is the foolish calculation of the U.S. imperialists that if they spread the story of "threat" from the north, the world will believe it, they will be able to brand the DPRK as criminals and this will help them justify their policy for a war of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. should give up such foolish drama to realize its strategic intention under the pretext of "threat from the north."
					
					 The U.S. moves to establish the missile defence system and to isolate and stifle the DPRK under the pretext of "missile threat" from the DPRK will not be able to escape worldwide rebuff, denunciation and fiasco.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to behave itself, bearing in mind its attempt to do harm to the DPRK while vociferating about the "threat from north Korea" is as foolish an act as prickling its own eyes with its own finger.

articles.title: 6th General Meeting of Japanese Regional Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Held
articles.content:
6th General Meeting of Japanese Regional Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Held
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The 6th General Meeting of the Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration was held in Tokyo on March 26.
					 A resolution was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is turning sour again owing to the hostile acts against fellow countrymen and war maneuvers with outside forces and the Korean nation has not yet escaped from confrontation and the danger of a war, the resolution said, adding:
					
					 The Japanese regional committee will take the lead in the struggle to usher in the second June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of By Our Nation Itself in conformity with the demand of the era and the aspiration of fellow countrymen.
					
					 We will firmly adhere to the principle of independence and the stand of By Our Nation Itself and make all efforts to preserve and implement the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reunification programmes common to the nation.
					
					 We will lay bare and denounce the south Korean authorities for their suppression on the pro-reunification patriotic forces under the pretext of security and fully support the people of different social standings in south Korea in their struggle to preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 We will sound a note of warning against Japan's moves for militarism, demand Japan make an apology and reparation for its past crimes and stop discrimination and human rights abuses against Koreans in Japan, and conduct an international solidarity movement with Koreans in the north, the south and overseas and broad peace-loving forces in the world to bring peace to Northeast Asia.
					
					 We will strengthen the Japanese regional committee, organize information activities for the country's reunification, reunification events, peace demonstrations, cultural and academic events, etc. in Tokyo, Osaka, Aichi, Fukuoka and other areas on major occasions for the reunification movement this year and thus arouse the Koreans in Japan to preserve and implement the joint declarations.
					
					 Son Hyong Gun was elected chairman of the Japanese regional committee at the meeting.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Uganda
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Uganda
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- An Ugandan national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed at the building of the Secretariat of the Uganda National Resistance Movement on March 21.
					 Kirunda Kivejinja, senior adviser to the Ugandan president, was elected adviser to the preparatory committee and Henri Masico, department director of the Presidency, elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The senior adviser and the department director, speaking at an inaugural ceremony, called for organizing diverse political and cultural events including meeting and seminar to praise Kim Il Sung's exploits on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Ugandan Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Ugandan Personages
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Day of the Sun serves as a common holiday of not only the Korean people but also the world progressive people.
					 Kirunda Kivejinja, senior adviser to the Ugandan president, and Henri Masico, department director of the Presidency, said this, speaking at the inaugural ceremony of the Ugandan national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) on March 21.
					
					 They noted that Kim Il Sung is an eternal friend of the African people as he founded the Juche idea and devoted his whole life to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 They stated that the Korean people have achieved great successes in their drive for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Kuwait
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed on March 23.
					 Yousfe Al Amiri, chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association who doubles as president of the Kuwait House of Works, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory commit set the celebration period from March 23 to April 17 and decided to widely introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and organize diverse political and cultural events including photo and book exhibition and film show.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Kuwait, Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Kuwait, Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Kuwait and a reading session in Guinea on March 22 and 23 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 The chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association said that the dear image and august name of the President are cherished in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also Arab people.
					
					 He noted that the President devoted his whole life to the freedom and happiness of the Korean people and supported the Arab people materially and morally in their struggle for defending the sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The chief in charge of international relations of the Kuwait House of Works said that the President regarded it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven and built the people's country.
					
					 The chief of Construction Site No. 1 in Conakry City, Guinea said that the President was a great man as he devoted his whole life to achieving the prosperity of the country and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 He stressed that the exploits performed by the President would always be cherished in the hearts of progressive mankind.

articles.title: Indonesian Paper Raps U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
Indonesian Paper Raps U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK
  Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian paper Suara Karya on March 21 carried a commentary titled "The DPRK demands the U.S. stop its hostile policy towards it".
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The trace of the Second World War is no longer to be seen with the passage of time and there is a balance in the positions of the countries but the tragedy of territorial partition and national division persists on the Korean peninsula only due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The ever-more undisguised political, economic and military pressure and sanctions of the U.S. and its followers are laying a stumbling block in the way of the peaceful development in the DPRK. 
					
					 The government and people of the DPRK like other countries and peoples have the legitimate right to defend their sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S., however, has always put a brake on the actions of the DPRK.  
					
					 The National Defence Commission of the DPRK in its statement clarified its principled stand on the U.S. hostile policy towards it.
					
					 The U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK are harmful ones.
					
					 The U.S. is kicking up a groundless "human rights" campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 These moves only touch off the resentment of the Korean people at the U.S.
					
					 The world progressives positively support the just struggle of the Korean people.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Condemned by Spanish Political Party
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Condemned by Spanish Political Party 
  Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of the People of Spain released a statement on March 20 to denounce the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Communist Party of the People of Spain extends full support and solidarity to the principled stand clarified by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The DPRK has taken positive measures to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 But the U.S. is making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK, disturbing peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are war maneuvers to invade the DPRK.
					
					 We will always be with the DPRK standing at the outpost of the struggle for defending socialism and anti-imperialist struggle.

articles.title: U.S., Most Brutal Country in World: Bulgarian Lawmaker
articles.content:
U.S., Most Brutal Country in World: Bulgarian Lawmaker
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian lawmaker Ilian Todorov released a commentary on March 7 denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 Whenever I see those regarding the U.S. as a country with a limitless possibility while eulogizing it, I cannot but feel like laughing at them, the author said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is a country of underwits and thieves.
					
					 The Western media makes a false propaganda that the Korean people are in poverty.
					
					 The U.S. and the West say that the human rights are being infringed on in the DPRK.
					
					 Though they have a great number of nuclear warheads enough to destroy the world, they are making a false report that the DPRK is threatening the global peace with nuclear weapons.
					
					 The West is also reporting that the DPRK ignited a war in the 1950s but countless are wars and armed interference by the U.S. including the Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the most brutal country.
					
					 If the DPRK is subject to sanctions, sanctions tens of times harsher than that should be slapped to the U.S. according to the impartiality.
					
					 But double standards are being applied in the world now.

Statement of NDC of DPRK Reported by Different Countries

articles.title: Japanese Ultra-rightist Conservative Organization's Appeal Turned down
articles.content:
Japanese Ultra-right Conservative Organization's Appeal Turned Down 
 Tokyo, March 27 (KNS-KCNA) -- Koreans and citizens in Japan including those concerned with Korean schools in Kyoto and Osaka, Japan turned down the shameless appeal made by the Citizens' Society against Special Privilege of Koreans in Japan, an ill-famed ultra-right conservative organization of Japan.
					 They recalled that the high court in Osaka on March 25 held a hearing on the appeal made by the conservative organization.
					
					 As far as the appeal made by the organization is concerned, the Kyoto District Court at the first hearing about the attack made by the above-said organization on Kyoto Korean Primary School No. 1 of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan in December 2009 ruled that the high-handed action perpetrated by gangsters was racial discrimination and breach of law, demanding the organization halt demeanors of national discrimination around the school and pay damages to it. 
					
					 Those concerned with the Korean school and Koreans in Japan reminded the organization that they, greatly infuriated by the appeal made by the organization, filed a suit with the district court in order to protect pupils of Korean schools imbuing them with the pride of the nation and asserted the justice of the ruling made at the first hearing calling for disallowing racial discrimination.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting held later stated that the attack on the school was a manifestation of national chauvinism in Japan.
					
					 They declared they would never tolerate the moves to stamp out the national education and conduct a dynamic action in defence of the national education.

articles.title: Portavoz de delegacion nortena al contacto Norte-Sur denuncia lanzamiento de volantes
articles.content:
Portavoz de delegacion nortena al contacto Norte-Sur denuncia lanzamiento de volantes
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que debido al demencial lanzamiento de las octavillas de contenido anti-RPDC en el Sur de Corea, las relaciones intercoreanas regresan a la coyuntura catastrofica, el portavoz de la delegacion de la parte nortena al contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion para revelar la gravedad del caso.
					Las actuales autoridades surcoreanas dirigidas por Park Geun-hye cuestionan absurdamente en el extranjero el problema nuclear de la RPDC e instigan en el interior al lanzamiento de octavillas y difamacion contra esa parte connacional.
					
					El continuo lanzamiento de volantes significa un acto de quiebra abierta del valioso acuerdo nacional y un crimen traidor mas grave e imperdonable en ningun caso, califica la declaracion y continua:
					
					En el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea, celebrado el 14 de febrero pasado, fue logrado un acuerdo historico en que ambas partes se comprometieron a la vista de la nacion coreana a no difamar ni calumniar a la contraparte.
					
					Pero, la realidad frustro nuestra esperanza.
					
					Quedo revelado que aquella pomposa promesa hecha por el encargo de Park Geun-hye no paso de ser una cortina de humo para encubrir el lanzamiento de volantes y la difamacion extremada que se desarrollan bajo el amparo de las autoridades.
					
					Preguntamos entonces si es la tactica de dialogo y negociaciones de Park inducir el acuerdo superficial para alcanzar su meta y si es la habilidad de "creacion de confianza" al estilo de ella invalidar sin vacilacion alguna ese acuerdo pretextando las "caracteristicas del regimen" y la "libertad de palabra".
					
					El escalonado lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC y la siniestra censura son el abierto acto provocador de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Ahora, Park denomino ese lanzamiento como "operacion de globos" y manda a tomar de antemano el estado de preparacion militar ante el posible contraataque de la RPDC.
					
					Esto demuestra que ellos saben que los volantes lanzados con la denominacion de la "operacion de globos" pueden ser la peligrosa chispa que provoque el contraataque militar.
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo que consideramos los volantes como nota de declaracion de guerra y la de sentencia capital a las escorias humanas que tomaron la iniciativa del lanzamiento.
					
					Quizas, desea tanto que tales papeles sucios conviertan el bastion de provocacion en monton de cenizas?
					
					Ahora es el momento en que ella tiene que tomar bien la opcion por si misma.
					
					Cuanto mas Park moviliza a las escorias humanas y prensa conservadora a la difamacion intrigante sobre los connacionales, tanto mas su honra sera echada en el fondo de la zanja.
					
					Los que se dedican a lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC y la difamacion contra los connacionales nadando contrapelo a la corriente de la epoca son precisamente escorias humanas y la prensa injusta.
					
					La connivencia con esas escorias humanas le ofrecera a Park solo mala fama como duena del gran basural.
					
					Hay la moralidad sobre la politica.
					
					El politico debe ser el humano mas sincero que nadie y perseguir solo la justicia y la veracidad.
					
					Si no, abusaria del poder presidencial en la difamacion y cometeria sin vacilacion el gran crimen antinacional.
					
					Para tener el elemental honor a presentarse otra vez ante nosotros, las autoridades surcoreanas deberan ejecutar debidamente los acuerdos intercoreanos. 
					
					Todos los connacionales estan observando el movimiento de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: CCACU advierte a autoridades japonesas que tratan de usurpar Casa Coreana
articles.content:
CCACU advierte a autoridades japonesas que tratan de usurpar Casa Coreana
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Comite Coreano de Ayuda a los Compatriotas en Ultramar (CCACU) hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion condenatoria a las autoridades japonesas que ultimamente, lanzan en la etapa muy peligrosa su campana orientada a reprimir y eliminar la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y la comunidad coreana en Japon.
					El dia 24, las autoridades japonesas instigaron a la Corte Local de Tokio a dictar una resolucion fascista que permite la venta ilegal del predio y edificio de la Casa Central de la Chongryon (conocida como Casa Coreana).
					
					Esa sentencia constituye flagrante violacion de la dignidad y derecho a la vida de la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon, siendo grave atentado contra la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Para eludir la responsabilidad, las autoridades japonesas describen esa resolucion como "juicio del organo judicial", pero esto no pasa de ser una excusa para encubrir su intencion criminal, senala asi el documento y prosigue:
					
					Al eliminar la base de actividades del Comite Central de la Chongryon, ellas quieren alcanzar su siniestro objetivo politico de restar la autoridad de esa organizacion ejemplar del autoctono movimiento de los coreanos residentes en ultramar y sofocar el mismo movimiento en Japon congelando al elevado entusiasmo patriotico de los compatriotas en el pais isleno.
					
					Cuando hace mas falta que nunca la creacion de confianza para la mejora de relaciones RPDC-Japon, las autoridades del pais isla produjeron adrede el motivo de desconfianza y por eso, la RPDC se ve obligada a tomar contramedidas pertinentes.
					
					Si Japon sigue tratando de despojar la Casa Coreana desoyendo la advertencia de la RPDC, la responsabilidad de todas las consecuencias recaera sobre las autoridades japonesas.

articles.title: Portavoz de AJDC denuncia la ilegalidad de resolucion de Corte Local de Tokio
articles.content:
Portavoz de AJDC denuncia la ilegalidad de resolucion de Corte Local de Tokio
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la Corte Local de Tokio de Japon dicto la resolucion de permitir la venta del predio y el edificio de la Casa Central de la Chongryon (conocida como Casa Coreana) bajo el control trasero de las autoridades japonesas, la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea (AJDC) hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion revelando y denunciando la ilegalidad de esa decision.
					La nota senala como sigue:
					
					La ilegalidad se manifiesta coherentemente en haber presentado con fraudes y estafas al licitador inhabil.
					
					La Corte Local de Tokio retardo la publicacion del resultado de la subasta sobre la Casa Coreana, realizada en octubre de 2013.
					
					Sin motivos justos, repitio de repente el dia 20 la licitacion y tomo la decision de permitir la venta a la compania japonesa Marunaka Holdings Co. Ltd.
					
					Esta compania fue descalificada ya en la subasta de octubre del ano pasado por sus muy pocas ofertas y recibio el dinero de garantia de licitacion que le ha devuelto la corte.
					
					Es una costumbre de juicio de los tribunales japoneses no autorizar la venta a la compania de tal antecedente.
					
					Por lo tanto, la decision de definir a Marunaka Holdings Co. Ltd como licitadora resulta evidentemente en todos los aspectos un acto de violacion de la ley.
					
					La ilegalidad se conoce tambien en la actitud dual de Corporacion de Resolucion y Coleccion, entidad acreedora.
					
					  Cuando surgio el problema de la Casa Coreana, la dicha corporacion busco la solucion mediante la reconciliacion con otros deudores, pero formulo la exigencia hostil y discriminatoria solo a la Chongryon de que reembolsara el monto de las deudas incluyendo hasta los intereses.
					
					  ?Por que habra guardado silencio esa organizacion tan calculadora ante la decision de la Corte Local de Tokio de autorizar la venta a precios baratos que no llegan ni a la mitad del valor de la Casa Coreana?
					
					  Historicamente, las autoridades japonesas consideraban la Casa Coreana, en que flamea la bandera de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, como espina atravesada en la garganta y tramaron los complots de toda indole para arrebatarla.
					
					  En ese contexto, la Corte Local de Tokio orquesto esta vez dicha farsa nunca vista antes violando la ley de Japon, la costumbre de juicio de los tribunales y hasta los tramites de subasta.
					
					  La AJDC protesta y rechaza rotundamente la decision de la Corte Local de Tokio y declara solemnemente al interior y exterior del pais la invalidez de ella.
					
					  Si las autoridades japonesas aprecian el decoro de su pais como "Estado constitucional" y desean la mejora de las relaciones con la RPDC, deberian sacar la mano de la campana para usurpar la Casa Coreana antes de que se haga tarde.
